title: Obby But You're on a Bike

thumbnailDetails.alt: Obby But You're on A Bike Play Free Online Game

headings.text: How to Play Obby But You're on a Bike

controls: Use WASD keys to move.Press and hold the right mouse button, then move the mouse to look around.Press the Spacebar to jump.
Move with the joystick on the left side of the screen.Drag across the screen to look around.Tap the button on the right side of the joystick to jump.
content.howToPlay: Hop on your bike and head into world 1 by entering that green door.Ride through ramps, loops, and tricky platforms to reach the finish line.Each level gives you 8 lives. Falling off the platform costs one life, and losing them all means starting the level over.Collect as many flags as you can to boost your score.¬†Upgrade your bike to improve speed and handling, and collect boosters to ride faster because, let's face it, your character's legs aren't getting any stronger.üö¥Complete all 8 levels to claim victory and brag about your Obby skills!
content.developer: Obby But You're on a Bike is created by GingerPlay.

fullContent: Home‚Ä∫ RobloxObby But You're on a BikeBy OnlineGames.ioMake Game Full ScreenHop on your bike and start riding in the wild world of Obby But You're on a Bike! This fun 3D platformer game allows you to tackle crazy obstacle courses as your Roblox character rides through ramps, loops, and narrow parkour. Each of the 8 worlds is packed with hundreds of flags to collect, making every ride an adventure. But there's a twist‚Äîyou have only 8 lives per level. Fall off the platform, and you'll lose a life. Use them all, and you'll have to restart that level from the beginning. Upgrade your bike, unlock boosters, and prove you're the ultimate Obby master. Don't wait‚Äîstart your riding journey on OnlineGames.io today! üö¥‚ú®ControlsComputer:Use WASD keys to move.Press and hold the right mouse button, then move the mouse to look around.Press the Spacebar to jump.Mobile:Move with the joystick on the left side of the screen.Drag across the screen to look around.Tap the button on the right side of the joystick to jump.How to Play Obby But You're on a BikeHop on your bike and head into world 1 by entering that green door.Ride through ramps, loops, and tricky platforms to reach the finish line.Each level gives you 8 lives. Falling off the platform costs one life, and losing them all means starting the level over.Collect as many flags as you can to boost your score.¬†Upgrade your bike to improve speed and handling, and collect boosters to ride faster because, let's face it, your character's legs aren't getting any stronger.üö¥Complete all 8 levels to claim victory and brag about your Obby skills!Game FeaturesUnlock better bikes to improve your chances of success.Use powerful boosts to clear tough jumps and obstacles.Unlock different skins like Barry, policeman and more.Spin wheels to grab prizes or complete missions to claim your award.DeveloperObby But You're on a Bike is created by GingerPlay.More Obby GamesIf you enjoyed this epic bike adventure, try Only Up Obby! because going up is the only direction when you've already mastered falling down in this one! üòÅClimb your way to the top in this parkour game where every step counts. It's perfect for players who love obby adventures.This article was updated on December 26, 20241 Player3DActionArcadeBikeCrazyFreeMobileParkourRacingRoblox
